sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useRef } from 'react' import '../styles/postcard.css' export default function PostCard({ image, title, date, totalEmoji, totalComment, isLove }) { const serverRef = useRef(process.env.REACT_APP_SEVER_IP + ":" + process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_PORT) useEffect(() => { }, []) return (

{title}

12 Step, 2023

favorite {totalEmoji}
{totalComment}
download
) }
